question: The Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) approved a schemes _________ for the period of 2016-20 with the 14th Finance Commission cycle.
explanation: SAMPADA - Scheme for Agro-Marine Processing and Development of Agro-Processing Clusters. The cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) approved the restructuring of schemes of the Ministry of Food Processing Industries (MoFPI) under new central Scheme "SAMPADA".
